display_long_description:
Project Wigglesworth is a narrative-driven adventure game set in the delightfully strange and whimsical town of Wigglesworth. Players take on the role of an unassuming protagonist who stumbles upon a series of odd events that hint at something far more mysterious lurking beneath the town’s cheerful surface. With a blend of humor, heart, and a touch of the bizarre, the game invites players to explore a richly detailed world filled with quirky characters, unpredictable twists, and layered storytelling.

As the story unfolds, players must solve clever puzzles, gather clues, and piece together the truth behind the town’s secrets—all while navigating eccentric conversations, strange customs, and the occasional talking animal. Every corner of Wigglesworth is packed with hidden details and interactive elements that reward curiosity and exploration. Whether sneaking into the Mayor’s office, decoding cryptic letters, or helping townsfolk with their peculiar problems, players will be drawn deeper into the game’s unfolding mystery.

With its unique art style, charming soundtrack, and offbeat tone, Project Wigglesworth delivers an unforgettable experience that balances comedy and intrigue. It’s a game about discovery, connection, and what it means to find purpose in the most unexpected of places.
